languages.text: "Ну вот, а ты ныл, что нам вилы! Сами Адептус Арбитес к нам на подмогу пришли! Видел их щиты? А пса того железного?"
"See? And here you were moaning that we were done for! Now look who's come to our rescue! The Adeptus Arbites! Have you seen their shields? And that iron dog?"
languages.original_text: "Ну вот, а ты ныл, что нам вилы! Сами Адептус Арбитес к нам на подмогу пришли! Видел их щиты? А пса того железного?"

traits.locale_text: "See? And here you were moaning that we were done for! Now look who's come to our rescue! The Adeptus Arbites! Have you seen their shields? And that iron dog?"
"See? And here you were moaning that we were done for! Now look who's come to our rescue! The Adeptus Arbites! Have you seen their shields? And that iron dog?"
"See? And here you were moaning that we were done for! Now look who's come to our rescue! The Adeptus Arbites! Have you seen their shields? And that iron dog?"
"See? And here you were moaning that we were done for! Now look who's come to our rescue! The Adeptus Arbites! Have you seen their shields? And that iron dog?"
"See? And here you were moaning that we were done for! Now look who's come to our rescue! The Adeptus Arbites! Have you seen their shields? And that iron dog?"
"See? And here you were moaning that we were done for! Now look who's come to our rescue! The Adeptus Arbites! Have you seen their shields? And that iron dog?"

languages.text: « Vous voyez ? Dire que vous vous plaigniez qu'on allait tous y passer ! Regardez qui vient à la rescousse ! L'Adeptus Arbites ! Vous avez vu leurs boucliers ? Et ce chien de fer ? »
languages.original_text: "See? And here you were moaning that we were done for! Now look who's come to our rescue! The Adeptus Arbites! Have you seen their shields? And that iron dog?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous voyez ? Dire que vous vous plaigniez qu'on allait tous y passer ! Regardez qui vient à la rescousse ! L'Adeptus Arbites ! Vous avez vu leurs boucliers ? Et ce chien de fer ? »

languages.text: "Seht ihr? Und ihr habt gejammert, dass wir erledigt sind. Jetzt seht euch an, wer uns rettet! Das Adeptus Arbites! Habt ihr die Schilde gesehen? Und diesen Eisenhund?"
languages.original_text: "See? And here you were moaning that we were done for! Now look who's come to our rescue! The Adeptus Arbites! Have you seen their shields? And that iron dog?"

traits.locale_text: "Seht ihr? Und ihr habt gejammert, dass wir erledigt sind. Jetzt seht euch an, wer uns rettet! Das Adeptus Arbites! Habt ihr die Schilde gesehen? Und diesen Eisenhund?"

languages.text: 「見たか？さっきまで俺たちはもう終わりだって泣き言言ってたくせに！でも見てみろ、助けに来てくれたのは誰だ？高等裁定局だぞ！あの盾、見たか？それにあの鉄の犬も！」
languages.original_text: "See? And here you were moaning that we were done for! Now look who's come to our rescue! The Adeptus Arbites! Have you seen their shields? And that iron dog?"

traits.locale_text: 「見たか？さっきまで俺たちはもう終わりだって泣き言言ってたくせに！でも見てみろ、助けに来てくれたのは誰だ？高等裁定局だぞ！あの盾、見たか？それにあの鉄の犬も！」

languages.text: «¿Ves? ¡Y tú que pensabas que estábamos acabados! ¡Mira quién ha venido a rescatarnos: el Adeptus Arbites! ¿Has visto sus escudos? ¿Y su perro de hierro?».
languages.original_text: "See? And here you were moaning that we were done for! Now look who's come to our rescue! The Adeptus Arbites! Have you seen their shields? And that iron dog?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Ves? ¡Y tú que pensabas que estábamos acabados! ¡Mira quién ha venido a rescatarnos: el Adeptus Arbites! ¿Has visto sus escudos? ¿Y su perro de hierro?».

languages.text: “看到了吗？你刚刚还在念叨，说咱们死定了！现在你看看！是谁来救咱们了？是法务部的人！看到他们的盾牌了吗？还有他们那条铁狗？”
languages.original_text: "See? And here you were moaning that we were done for! Now look who's come to our rescue! The Adeptus Arbites! Have you seen their shields? And that iron dog?"

traits.locale_text: “看到了吗？你刚刚还在念叨，说咱们死定了！现在你看看！是谁来救咱们了？是法务部的人！看到他们的盾牌了吗？还有他们那条铁狗？”

languages.text: "Bak. Bir de işimiz bitti diye ağlıyordun! Kimler geldi de bizi kurtardı, bak gör! Adeptus Arbites! Kalkanlarına baksana! Hele şu demirden köpeğe."
languages.original_text: "See? And here you were moaning that we were done for! Now look who's come to our rescue! The Adeptus Arbites! Have you seen their shields? And that iron dog?"

traits.locale_text: "Bak. Bir de işimiz bitti diye ağlıyordun! Kimler geldi de bizi kurtardı, bak gör! Adeptus Arbites! Kalkanlarına baksana! Hele şu demirden köpeğe."
